title: Vaccinations and Point-of-Care Services
description: Easy online scheduling is here! Our scheduling system just got easier. Now, you can schedule vaccinations and one-stop testing services online ...
cleaned_text: online scheduling is here! Our scheduling system just got easier. Now, you can schedule vaccinations and one-stop testing services online without waiting - no MyChart account necessary. Just click the button below, choose PHARMACY and fill out the information, then pick a time and location that work for you. It's easy! Flu shots for 2023 flu season now available Standard and high-dose flu shots for the 2023 flu season are now available at UK Retail Pharmacies. The high-dose shot is approved for people age 65 and older. Standard flu shots are also available now for people age 9 and older at all UK Retail Pharmacy locations. (We do, however, recommend that children under 9 years old, pregnant women, HIV patients and transplant patients see their doctor for vaccination). UK HealthCare employees should consult their supervisor to arrange for a flu shot via Employee Health. COVID vaccine may be received at the same time as the flu shot; just let your pharmacist know. For questions about our vaccination and point-of-care testing services or to request an appointment, call [859-562-2018](tel:859-562-2018). The following UK Retail Pharmacy locations are offering flu and COVID-19 vaccinations: - Kentucky Clinic Retail Pharmacy: Monday-Friday, 9 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. Walk-ins accepted. - Chandler Retail Pharmacy: Monday-Thursday, 9 a.m. - 4 p.m. Appointment only. - University Health Retail Pharmacy: Monday-Friday, 9:30 a.m. - 3:30 p.m. Appointments recommended, walk-ins accepted when staffing allows. - Good Samaritan Retail Pharmacy: Monday-Friday, 9 a.m. - 4 p.m. Appointment only. - Turfland Clinic Retail Pharmacy: Monday-Friday, 9 a.m. - 6:30 p.m. Walk-ins accepted. - UK Fountain Court Retail Pharmacy (Pharmacist Care Clinic, Room 220): Monday-Friday, 9 a.m. - 8 p.m. & Saturday-Sunday 8 a.m. - 5 p.m. Appointments recommended, walk-ins accepted Monday-Friday. - The Apothecary at Gatton Student Center (first floor): Monday-Friday, 9 a.m. - 5 p.m. Walk-ins accepted. Vaccinations, testing and treatment: No prescription necessary UK Retail Pharmacies now offers a wide range of point-of-care services without a prescription, including: - Vaccinations for: - Covid-19 - Flu - Open to anyone age 9 and up. (We recommend pregnant women discuss all vaccinations with their OB/GYN first.) - High-dose flu shots also available - Hepatitis A & B - Shingles - Pneumococcal pneumonia - Human Papilloma Virus (HPV) - Tetanus - Whooping cough - UTIs: One-stop testing and treatment (Kentucky Clinic Pharmacy only) - Open to women age 18-64 who have a history of UTIs and no unusual symptoms - Flu and Strep A: One-stop testing and treatment - Tobacco cessation: counseling and medication Now offering help with nasal allergies We now offer consultations for allergic rhinitis (nasal allergies) at our Kentucky Clinic, Turfland, University Health, Apothecary (Gatton Student Center) or Fountain Court Retail Pharmacy locations! No prescription required. COVID-19 vaccinations The US Food and Drug Administration recently moved to simplify the COVID-19 vaccination schedules for most people. As part of these changes, the current bivalent vaccines (original and omicron BA.4/BA.5 strains) are now used for all doses for anyone 6 months of age and older, including for an additional dose or doses for certain populations. The original monovalent Moderna and Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccines are no longer authorized for use in the United States. If you have been fully vaccinated and previously received required boosters, you do not need an additional booster at this time. Vaccinations following these new guidelines are available at multiple UK Retail Pharmacy locations as well as the UK Pharmacist Care Clinic at 245 Fountain Court, Room 220. Fountain Court is located just off Man O'War near Richmond Road. Vaccinations for children under 18 are given only at the Fountain Court location, and all minors must be accompanied by a parent or guardian. Flu shots may be received at the same time as the COVID vaccine; just let your pharmacist know. For more information and to request an appointment, visit the [ukvaccine.org](https://ukhealthcare.uky.edu/covid-19/vaccine). Schedule Vaccinations Please fill out the form below and email to [ukhcimmunization@uky.edu](mailto:ukhcimmunization@uky.edu) prior to your appointment. Include the date and time of your appointment in the email. You may also print the form and bring it with you
